attr.name: Applies to
attr.content: All elements (in SVG, applies to all graphics elements and all container elements exceptthe <defs>element)

attr.name: Notes
attr.content: An <image> is any of the value types <url>, <image()>, <image-set()>, <element()>, <cross-fade()>, or <gradient> (all deÂ€ned elsewhere in the book); <mask-source> is a url() that points to a <mask> element in an SVG image
